modName: Hot Tip - Get A Dopey Death Hound Follower
summary: This is a how-to.  Get a death hound follower that will sandbox like a regular dog.
descriptionHtml:
[u]THIS IS NOT A MOD.[/u]
This is a how-to.  I've decided to share some of the silly things I've found that can be done to the game.

Today, we're going to get a dopey death hound follower.  This death hound won't stand around lifelessly!  It will do all the things regular dogs will do: sandbox, smile, pant, scratch, lie down, sit, and bark.  Best of all, it will do it all in the creepy death hound voice.  Superbly weird! 

[u]What you will need:[/u]
[list]
[*]SKSE
[*]SKYUI
[*]Dawnguard
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?]Jaxonz Renamer[/url]
[*]A follower mod with a force-recruition feature; I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url]
[/list]
[u]I recommend:[/u]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65033/?]Death Hound HD[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54045/?]New Death Hound Sounds[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60520/?]Sneaky Canines[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64021/?]Useful Dogs[/url]
[/list]
[u]Steps:[/u]
[list]
[*]Launch the game and open the console (usually the ~ key).
[*]Type: help "cusith"
[*]Something should come up that starts with the header 'NPC.'  It should have a number in parentheses followed by CuSith's name.  We want the number.
[*]Type: player.placeatme (the number without parentheses) 1
[*]Close the console (~ key again).
[*]CuSith will appear.  Unless you are a Dawnguard vampire, you won't be able to talk to him.  This is where the follower mod comes in.  Force-recruit him.
[*]Use Jaxonz Renamer to name CuSith whatever you want. 
[*]Open the console again.  
[*]Click on your renamed death hound and type: sexchange
[*]Close the console
[/list]
If you've done this right, the death hound should start behaving like a normal dog.  Congratulations!  This change is permanent until you use the 'sexchange' function on the death hound again.  Repeat the steps above as many times as you like/as your follower mod will allow for more dumb death hounds. 

If you liked this tip and want to endorse it, download the dummy file.  It contains the death hound doodle I drew.
author: Versispellis
